title: Are Stephen King's books connected in any way? - Quora

response.answer_text: Absolutely. The Dark Tower series is especially good at that. Though you may miss the references if you haven’t read many of his other books. For instance, in one of his novels. “Pennywise Lives” is graffitied on a wall. Pennywise being the clown from IT.
Yes. In a way. If you are a fan of his you will notice that characters from previous books are casually mentioned in his newer books.
